title: enru tAn murugA unnaruL
sahitya:
enru tAn murugA unnaruL peruvEnO ennuLLam kuLiravE inbattuLir miLira


anupallavi

  kunru ovvonrAga kuDi koNDiDa Eri ninra un kaLaippArik-koNDirukkinranaiyO


caraNam    kanrinaik-kaNDa pashu kanivu koNDadan pashi kunravE pAlUTTum anrO adaip-pOla
enrum un aDiyArin iDar tIrat-tuDaippadil kunrAp-parivu kATTum kunrakkuDiyOnE
